mapper.insert: insert into member(me_id, me_pw, me_name, me_phone, me_birth, me_gender, me_email, me_postnum, me_add1, me_add2, me_add3, me_add4) values(#{user.me_id}, #{user.me_pw}, #{user.me_name}, #{user.me_phone}, #{user.me_birth}, #{user.me_gender}, #{user.me_email}, #{user.me_postnum}, #{user.me_add1}, #{user.me_add2}, #{user.me_add3}, #{user.me_add4})
